name: ChlamydiaTrachomatisInfectionCombinationTestsThatIncludeChlamydiaTrachomatisNucleicAcid
title: Chlamydia trachomatis Infection (Combination Tests that include Chlamydia trachomatis Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Chlamydia trachomatis Nucleic Acid in combination with at least one other organism.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chlamydia trachomatis Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
